string-array.name: excuses_names_low
string-array.item: Go to little cousin\'s birthday party
Pick up brother/sister from friends house
I have to study for a test
I have to pick up my dog from the vet

string-array.name: excuses_names_med
string-array.item: Friend\'s car broke down and needs a ride
Have to go on a conference call for work
My boss asked me to come into work
Have to take my Grandmom to the pharmacy
Have to work on a group project

string-array.name: excuses_names_high
string-array.item: A pipe in my house broke
My Mom is in the hospital
My house alarm is going off
